Inbreeding depression was calculated for rate of seed-set, plant biomass, and seedpod weight as these variables represented typical responses within their respective life-history categories (Table 2). Cumulative inbreeding depression was calculated by multiplying mean relative fitness of pregermination and postgermination life-history stages (seed-set rate * seedpod weight) (Husband and Schemske 1996).
